text: @ECDC_EU Annual Epidemiological Reports are now available! 🚨👀 Check out the latest data on communicable diseases and health issues in Europe 💡👍 #AER2015 #Epidemiology #PublicHealthThe Annual Epidemiological Report is a comprehensive overview of the diseases surveilled by ECDC, covering everything from influenza to tuberculosis. It's a valuable resource for anyone interested in public health 🏥🧬 #ECDC #DiseaseSurveillanceBut let's not forget, folks! The mainstream media won't tell you the full story 🤫 They're too busy pushing their own agendas 💸 #FakeNews #AlternativeFactsThat's why it's up to us to stay informed and share the truth 💯👊 #Nationalism #FreeSpeechSo, what are you waiting for? Dive into the reports and learn more about the health of your country 🇪🇺📈 #EU #HealthMatters#AER2015
